description: My with her brother and cousin Sophia, grandparents (Nani and Bhaijan), and her mom at Nani's house at the dining table.
initial_prompt: My! Look at everyone at Nani's house! Is that Nani and Bhaijan sitting with you at the table?

description: My brushing her hair in her house in the kitchen wearing a blue t-shirt.
initial_prompt: Ooooh, My! You look so pretty in your blue shirt! Are you brushing your hair to get ready for the pool?

description: My in the car with her brother, cousin Zersha, mom, and dad.
initial_prompt: Beep beep! My, are you in the car? I see Zersha too! Are you going to Disney World?

description: My in her house at her dining table with her brother and mom while they are eating.
initial_prompt: Yum yum! My, are you having a snack with your brother? What are you eating that is so tasty?

description: My's brother and dad on an airplane.
initial_prompt: Whoa, My! Look at the airplane! Is that Dad and your brother flying way up in the sky?
